coreAttributes.name: day of release
coreAttributes.description: A small, red pill, individually packaged in a foil and plastic wrapper. While the text printed on the foil identifies this pill as an 'Orally-Administered Release', it's colloquially known as either an 'o-pill', and temporarily allows orgasm when it is otherwise inhibited.
